subject: Flock Safety Case # 01095597
body:
You don't often get email from donotreply@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Thank you for contacting Flock Safety Support. We have received your email and opened a support case # 01095597 for you.

A support team member will review your request and respond within 48 business hours (Monday-Friday, 8 AM - 8 PM EST).

For urgent assistance, please visit our Help Center https://help.flocksafety.com/  or call us at 1-866-901-1781 during business hours and reference the case number above for immediate support.

Stay safe,
Flock Safety Support


Original Message:

Good afternoon,

We continue to have cameras that are being separated right at the middle of the pole, taken off the pole and smashed on the ground. They are removing the bolt in the middle each time.

Here is the list on the newest ones that have been destroyed.

P#021 River Road @ Randy Pape Beltline NB This one was seen on the ground but stolen before an officer arrived.
Serial 541109P021007ED

P#032 Chambers Street @ 25th Avenue NB This one was recovered and taken to our evidence unit.
Serial 241109P0210092Z

The Chambers Street one was within the area we have been experiencing problems. The River Road was quite far away, a conversation about moving any LPR's that are on Flock poles to traffic lights needs to happen.

Derek

Detective D. DeWitt
Financial Crimes Unit
Special Weapons and Tactics Team
Background Investigations Team
Eugene Police Department
300 County Club Road
Eugene, OR 97401
Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m.
Desk Phone - 541-682-2682
Work Cell - 541-743-6192

[cid:image001.png@01DBD9F9.BEDAB550]

To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to support+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com.  <https://flocksafety.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?oid=00D6g000003tehf&esid=018Pi00000mW7PK&from=ext>
